verbs.description: Shortly after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: blasted] [ARG1: Canada] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] and said the U.S. would not endorse a joint statement with other world leaders at the Group of Seven summit in Quebec , the nearly 4,000 word communique was released .
